the mermaid's purse

Worldbuilding
Resources for worldbuilders who want to make their world as realistic as possible, or who want to know what the rules are in order to break them. Astronomy, earth sciences, biology.
Language
Subsection of worldbuilding large enough to merit being mentioned separately. Covers as many fields of linguistics as I can fit in my library.
Jekyll
Building your own custom wiki for your worldbuilding with the static site generator Jekyll!

The code for this website is released under the MIT license.

Except where specified otherwise, the information provided here is in the public domain. Do whatever you like with it.
